attributes.action: Stop the sale of Wembley Stadium to private hands.
attributes.background: There are reports that the FA have agreed to sell Wembley Stadium to Shahid Khan, the American billionaire. This stadium only opened in 2007, at an estimated total cost of £1 billion (including improvements to local transport infrastructure). This would see a national asset being sold abroad.

rejection.details:
Any decision about selling Wembley Stadium is the responsibility of the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact the FA directly about this issue:
http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us

You could start a new petition to ask the UK Government to urge the FA not to sell Wembley Stadium.
